typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Detalle Orden} as integer,
		{Numero Orden} as string,
		{Producto ID} as integer,
		{Linea Total} as double,
		Cantidad as integer,
		Descuento as double,
		{Precio Unitario} as double,
		Ganancia as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExTLdetallesdeordenes
ExTLdetallesdeordenes select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(PK_detalledeordenes as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(1==1) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 filter(!isNull(Descuento)) ~> Filter2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		PK_DetalleOrden as integer,
		PK_Order as integer,
		Detalle_Orden as string,
		Linea_Total as double,
		Cantidad as decimal(18,5),
		Descuento as decimal(5,5),
		Precio_Unitario as decimal(18,5),
		Ganancia as decimal(18,5),
		PK_Producto as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Almacenarproducto

source(output(
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		{Region ID} as integer,
		Target as decimal(18,5)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtTargetTable
ExtTargetTable keyGenerate(output(PK_Metas as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AgregarSurrogateKey
AgregarSurrogateKey filter(!isNull({Año}) && !isNull(Mes) && !isNull({Region ID}) && !isNull(Target) && !isNull(PK_Metas)) ~> Filter1
AgregarSurrogateKey filter(isNull({Año}) || isNull(Mes) || isNull({Region ID}) || isNull(Target) || isNull(PK_Metas)) ~> Filter2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as integer,
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		Region_ID as integer,
		TARGET as decimal(18,5)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Truncate Table DIM_Metas'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta = PK_Metas,
		{Año},
		Mes,
		Region_ID = {Region ID},
		TARGET = Target
	)) ~> AlmacenarMetasDWH
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as string,
		{Año} as string,
		Mes as string,
		Region_ID as string,
		TARGET as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from Orphan_Metas;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta = PK_Metas,
		{Año},
		Mes,
		Region_ID = {Region ID},
		TARGET = Target
	)) ~> Orphans
